RemoteDebug

Initiative to unify remote debugging across browsers.

Tweet Follow @remotedebug

RemoteDebug specifications

No specifications has been published yet.

Specifications for existing remote debugging protocols

  • Opera Scope Transport Protocol

    Used by older versions of Opera before they moved to Chromium.

  • WebKit Remote Debug Protocol

    Used by Apple Safari.

  • Chrome Remote debugging protocol

    Used by Google Chrome & Opera.

  • Mozilla debugging protocol

    Used by Mozilla Firefox & Mozilla FirefoxOS.

  • Firebug CrossFire

    Available for Firefox via an extension (maybe?)
